Unusual access patterns, authentication.Data: Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Zeek conn.log, Zeek smtp.log
Unusual access patterns, authentication.Action: Analyze authentication logs (Event ID 4624/4625) and Zeek conn.log targeting mail servers. Identify access attempts from unusual source IPs or users. Calculate historical login frequency and times per user/IP; identify anomalies using descriptive statistics or deviation analysis. Look for unusual email header fields (e.g., 'X-MS-Exchange-Organization-AutoForwarded' in Zeek smtp.log/http.log) and analyze volume using time series analysis.

Unusual process activity accessing local.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4688, Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log
Unusual process activity accessing local.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for access to known email file locations (.pst, .ost) by unusual processes (Event ID 4688). Correlate process activity with network connections (Zeek conn.log) exhibiting high outbound data volume (use byte counts from Zeek). Use correlation analysis to link unusual file access with suspicious network flows.
